question: When was Miguel Delibes born?
ground_truth: Miguel Delibes was born on 1 September 1919.

question: Which town did Miguel Delibes spend many summers in?
ground_truth: Miguel Delibes spent many summers in the Valencian town of Deia.

question: Where was Delibes enlisted during the Spanish Civil War?
ground_truth: Delibes was enlisted in the Air Force on the Republican side.

question: In what year did Miguel Delibes marry Ángeles de Castro?
ground_truth: Miguel Delibes married Ángeles de Arena on June 15, 1956.

question: Which novel won the Premio Nadal in 1949?
ground_truth: "La sombra del ciprés es mu larga" won the Premio Nadal in 1949.

question: What job did Delibes secure in 1943?
ground_truth: In 1943, Delibes secured a job as a journalist.

question: Which novel marked Delibes' emergence on the Spanish literary scene?
ground_truth: "La sombra del ciprés es mu larga" marked Delibes' emergence on the Spanish literary scene.

question: What was the occupation of Delibes' father?
ground_truth: Delibes' father was a law intern.

question: What did Delibes study after returning to his hometown post-war?
ground_truth: Delibes studied music and law.

question: Which book did Delibes publish shortly after suffering fevers?
ground_truth: Shortly after suffering fevers, Delibes published "El camino."

question: What position was Delibes appointed to in 1953?
ground_truth: Delibes was appointed deputy director of the newspaper El Diario AS in 1953.

question: What was Delibes' third child's name?
ground_truth: Delibes' third child's name was Julián.

question: Which year was the film version of El camino directed by Ana Mariscal shot?
ground_truth: The film version of El camino was shot in 1976.

question: In which year did Delibes resign as director of El Diario AS?
ground_truth: Delibes resigned as director of El Diario AS in 1973.

question: What is the name of Delibes' novel considered his masterpiece?
ground_truth: "Cinco horas con Juan" is considered Delibes' masterpiece.

question: When was Delibes appointed to the Royal Spanish Academy?
ground_truth: Delibes was appointed to the Royal Spanish Academy on 11 January 1986.

question: Who handed the academic medal to Delibes during his induction?
ground_truth: Dámaso Alonso handed the academic medal to Delibes.

question: Which book contains Delibes' induction speech?
ground_truth: "Un mundo que se ahoga" contains Delibes' induction speech.

question: What did Delibes publish in the same year he was elected to the Hispanic Society?
ground_truth: Delibes published "El príncipe reventado" in the same year.

question: Which of Delibes' novels won the Premio de la Crítica in 1976?
ground_truth: "Las ratas" won the Premio de la Crítica in 1976.
